    public interface VisibilityListener
    Listen for visibility condition changes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onVisibilityConditions​(java.util.List<VisibilityCondition> conditions)
      Visibility conditions have changed or should be processed This is where implementations should go through their contents and apply visibility based on these conditions

        Visibility conditions have changed or should be processed This is where implementations should go through their contents and apply visibility based on these conditions

        conditions - List of visibility conditions
